TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragStartedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides information about the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> event that occurs when a user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control with the mouse..

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float64 horizontalOffset, float64 verticalOffset) cil managed

Docs.param: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb">.
The vertical offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb">.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs"> class.
Gets the horizontal offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb">.
Docs.value: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb">. There is no default value.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> event to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler> type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation casts the as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler>.

Docs.summary: Gets the vertical offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb">.
Docs.value: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb">. There is no default value.
